attachments.title: Elon Musk's Hyperloop Is Actually Sort Of Happening
attachments.text: The Hyperloop is a concept for a transportation system whereby a capsule inside a near-vacuum tube can accelerate up to around 1,220 kilometers (760 miles) per hour, providing a rapid transport system for passengers. Itâ€™s estimated that a trip from Washington D.C. to New York City would take just 30 minutes.

text: <@U026NB2U2>: SFO to PDX in 50 minutes sounds like a definite improvement over our journey
